param.description: The `date_created` value, specified as `YYYY-MM-DD`, of the resources to read. You can also specify inequality: `DateCreated<=YYYY-MM-DD` will return recordings generated at or before midnight on a given date, and `DateCreated>=YYYY-MM-DD` returns recordings generated at or after midnight on a date.

The `date_created` value, specified as `YYYY-MM-DD`, of the resources to read. You can also specify inequality: `DateCreated<=YYYY-MM-DD` will return recordings generated at or before midnight on a given date, and `DateCreated>=YYYY-MM-DD` returns recordings generated at or after midnight on a date.

The `date_created` value, specified as `YYYY-MM-DD`, of the resources to read. You can also specify inequality: `DateCreated<=YYYY-MM-DD` will return recordings generated at or before midnight on a given date, and `DateCreated>=YYYY-MM-DD` returns recordings generated at or after midnight on a date.

Whether to record during a pause. Can be: `skip` or `silence` and the default is `silence`. `skip` does not record during the pause period, while `silence` will replace the actual audio of the call with silence during the pause period. This parameter only applies when setting `status` is set to `paused`.
